price: 15. Ne, jei jis nesiliaus, Mes tikrai vilksime jį už kuokšto (ant kaktos),
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
